name: Wizard Viking vs The Claudian Empire
name_original: Wizard Viking vs The Claudian Empire
description:
This game was made for the "Little People Game Jam 4". The Theme for the game jam was "Alternate History". Historically, Rome began an invasion of Britain in 44AD and later conquered the isles. This game is the scenario in which there was a man who was capable of defending Britain against the Roman Empire under the rule of Claudius.

Programs Used:

-Photoshop

-FL Studio

-Unity

Credits:

Coding by Mitchell Bryan

Art by Alex Baker

Music arranged by Mitchell Bryan
